titleInfo.title: WADDY et al v. LAWLER et al
titleInfo.subTitle: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS THAT THE PETITION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS COPRUS BE DENIED AND THAT A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHOULD NOT ISSUE AS WE DO NOT BELIEVE THAT PETITIONER HAS MADE A SUBSTANTIAL SHOWING OF THE DENIAL OF A CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT. PETITIONER MAY FILE OBJECTIONS TO THIS REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION, ETC. OBJECTIONS TO R&R DUE BY 11/20/2008. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE DAVID R. STRAWBRIDGE ON 10/29/08. 10/30/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 2:08-cv-00286; WADDY et al v. LAWLER et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of Pennsylvania
extension.docketText: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS THAT THE PETITION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS COPRUS BE DENIED AND THAT A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHOULD NOT ISSUE AS WE DO NOT BELIEVE THAT PETITIONER HAS MADE A SUBSTANTIAL SHOWING OF THE DENIAL OF A CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT. PETITIONER MAY FILE OBJECTIONS TO THIS REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION, ETC. OBJECTIONS TO R&R DUE BY 11/20/2008. SIGNED BY MAGISTRATE JUDGE DAVID R. STRAWBRIDGE ON 10/29/08. 10/30/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

titleInfo.title: WADDY et al v. LAWLER et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER THAT THE REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION IS APPROVED AND ADOPTED; THE PETITION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS IS DENIED; A CERTIFICATE OF APPEALABILITY SHALL NOT ISSUE, IN THAT THE PETITIONER HAS NOT MADE A SUBSTANTIAL SHOWING OF THE DENIAL OF A CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHT, ETC; AND THE CLERK OF COURT SHALL MARK THIS CASE CLOSED FOR STATISTICAL PURPOSES.. SIGNED BY HONORABLE BERLE M. SCHILLER ON 1/13/09. 1/14/09 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )

SIGNED BY HONORABLE BERLE M. SCHILLER ON 1/13/09. 1/14/09 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED AND FAXED.(lvj, )
